info.title: Nimbus API
info.description:
API for Nimbus

## Rate Limiting
This API implements rate limiting to ensure fair usage and protect our services. The current rate limit is:

- **500 requests per 10 minutes** per IP address

If you exceed this limit, you will receive a 429 (Too Many Requests) response. Please wait for the rate limit window to reset before making additional requests.

If you need more, please contact us at **thanhle@getnimbus.io** or TG **@thanhle27** to get premium API Key.

owner.description: The owner address of the NFTs

id.description: The unique identifier for the webhook

owner.description: The API key of the webhook owner

url.description: The URL to which webhook events will be sent

addresses.description: List of addresses being monitored by this webhook

chain.description: The blockchain chain associated with this webhook

createdAt.description: The date and time when the webhook was created

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the webhook was last updated

coins.description: The list of tokens in pool/vault

get.description: Retrieves Decentralized Identifier (DID) associated with an address. Currently supports SUI Name Service (SNS) for Sui addresses and domain TLDs for SOL addresses.

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The blockchain address to query DID accounts for

data.description: List of name services associated with the address

get.summary: Get NFT holding information for an address
get.description: Retrieves NFT holding information for a given address, including collection details and token information

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get NFT holding information for

200.description: Successful response with NFT holding information

401.description: Unauthorized access for bundle addresses without owner

get.summary: Get holding information for an address
get.description: Retrieves holding information for a given address, including token balances and their values

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get holding information for

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Force a refresh of the data instead of using cached results

parameters.name: includePnl
parameters.description: Include profit and loss information (default is false)

200.description: Successful response with paginated holding information

is_spam.description: Whether token is marked as spam

401.description: Unauthorized access for CEX addresses without owner

get.summary: Get paginated holding information for an address
get.description: Retrieves paginated holding information for a given address, including token balances and their values

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Wallet address to get holding info

parameters.name: force_refresh
parameters.description: Force a refresh of the data instead of using cached results

parameters.name: includePnl
parameters.description: Include profit and loss information (default is false)

200.description: Successful response with paginated holding information

is_spam.description: Whether token is marked as spam

400.description: Invalid address provided or non-Sui address

get.description: Prepares and retrieves position information for a given address across various chains and protocols

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to prepare positions for

200.description: Successful response with prepared position information

get.description: Retrieves position information for a given address across various chains and protocols

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get positions for

parameters.name: protocol
parameters.description: The specific protocol to query positions. You can get the protocol from api **"/v2/address/{address}/positions-prepare"**

get.summary: Get trading statistics for an address
get.description: Retrieves trading statistics for a given address over the last 30 days

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: The address to get trading statistics for

get.description: Validates a given address and returns its context information

type.description: The type of the address (e.g., EVM, BTC, MOVE)

chain.description: The blockchain associated with the address

post.description: Creates a new webhook for event notifications.

url.description: The URL to send event notifications to.

get.description: Retrieves all webhooks associated with the API key.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the webhook to update

url.description: The new URL for the webhook.

addresses.description: Updated list of addresses to monitor.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the webhook to delete

post.description: Simulates a webhook event and sends a hardcoded transaction to the specified webhook URL.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the webhook to update

get.summary: Get historical APY data for a specific vault

post.description: Calculates potential returns for yield farming based on investment amount and price changes

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the vault to simulate

priceChangeA.description: Expected price change for token A (percentage)

priceChangeB.description: Expected price change for token B (percentage)

weightA.description: Weight of token A in the pool

weightB.description: Weight of token B in the pool

200.description: Simulation results for different time periods

400.description: Invalid parameters or missing required fields

get.summary: Get APR data for a specific protocol

parameters.name: minTvl
parameters.description: The minimum TVL of the protocol

parameters.name: maxTvl
parameters.description: The maximum TVL of the protocol

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: Query pools/vaults involve with token address (optional, default is "")

parameters.name: tvl
parameters.description: filter total value locked (optional, default is "")

get.description: Fetches the price of one or more SUI tokens for specified addresses and an optional timestamp.

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of SUI token addresses. Maximum 50 tokens.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Optional timestamp to get the price at a specific time.

200.description: Successful response with SUI token price information.

contract_address.description: The contract address of the SUI token.

symbol.description: The symbol of the SUI token.

price.description: The price of the SUI token.

last24hPrice.description: The price of the SUI token in the last 24 hours.

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the SUI token.

source.description: The source of the price information.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters.

post.description: Fetches the price of one or more SUI tokens for specified addresses and an optional timestamp.

addresses.description: Comma-separated list of SUI token addresses. Maximum 50 tokens.

timestamp.description: Optional timestamp to get the price at a specific time.

200.description: Successful response with SUI token price information.

contract_address.description: The contract address of the SUI token.

symbol.description: The symbol of the SUI token.

price.description: The price of the SUI token.

last24hPrice.description: The price of the SUI token in the last 24 hours.

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the SUI token.

source.description: The source of the price information.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters.

get.description:
Retrieves historical price data for a SUI token with different time intervals based on the range
Unix timestamp in seconds. If not provided, returns data for last 24 hours.
Different ranges will have different intervals:
- < 1 day: 5-minute intervals
- < 7 days: 1-hour intervals
-  7 days: 1-day intervals

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start timestamp in seconds. If not provided, defaults to 24 hours ago

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: End timestamp in seconds. If not provided, defaults to current time

200.description: Successful response with price chart data

400.description: Invalid address or timestamp parameters provided

get.description: Retrieves the current price of one SUI token based on provided address and an optional timestamp.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Optional timestamp to fetch the price at a specific time.

200.description: Successful response containing SUI token price details.

contract_address.description: The contract address of the SUI token.

symbol.description: The symbol representing the SUI token.

price.description: The current price of the SUI token.

last24hPrice.description: The price of the SUI token over the last 24 hours.

timestamp.description: The Unix timestamp of the price data.

decimals.description: The number of decimal places for the SUI token.

source.description: The source providing the price information.

400.description: Bad request due to missing or invalid parameters.

get.summary: Get token price history for SUI
get.description: Retrieves historical price data for a token with different time ranges and intervals

200.description: Historical price data for the token
